a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Women participating in decision-making vs. children per woman,
Women aged 15-49 who participate in deciding their own healthcare, major household purchases, and visiting family.
(own health care, major household purchases, and visiting family % of women age 15-49)
Data source: UN, World Population Prospects (2024); Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS) via World Bank (2025)
